ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team4

Class WebInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team4.WebInterface

  • public class WebInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class responsible for getting the JSON objects from the web server.
    Author:
    team4
